hjz_zork

Enum GameState

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<GameState>
      • hjz_zork.GameState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<GameState>

     enum GameState
extends java.lang.Enum<GameState>
    An enum singleton representing the game's state.
    Version:
    1.0, 11/05/2016
    Author:
    Hollis Pultz, John Pruchnic, Zachary Zwierko
